channel.title: NPC Drops? Please help
channel.description:
Hey, I've been looking all the morning for npc drops, I found the npcdrops.cfg but I need to know what colum means what... Heres an exemple: [code]npcdrop = 2783 1079 1 10[/code]
Hope you can help. Caillou...

item.title: NPC Drops? Please help
item.dc:creator: @caillou0 caillou0
item.description:
@caillou0 wrote:

Hey,
I’ve been looking all the morning for npc drops, I found the npcdrops.cfg but I need to know what colum means what…
Heres an exemple:

npcdrop = 2783	1079	1	10

Hope you can help.
Caillou…
